name: cheesy
content:
cheesy adjective
(BAD STYLE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
informal of bad quality or in bad taste: cheesy hotel music cheesy adverts
A cheesy smile is wide but not sincere: She gave a cheesy grin to the cameras.

cheesy adjective
(LIKE CHEESE)
tasting like or of cheese: cheesy snacks
UK informal If someone's feet, shoes, or socks are cheesy, they smell unpleasant: Someone here's got cheesy feet!

cheap or of low quality: The tourist shops had nothing but cheesy souvenirs.
